column4: BeOS --- I do not know if ubuntu live has it but KNOPIX sure have it --- GPARTED or something like this allows you to both shrink or reformat any drive --- isprety culo
BeOSMrx --- just use GParted ---- in Knopix --- is straight forward --- and allows you to do anything you want --- when I shrink an existing partition on a laptop (do dual boot) it took like 3 hours
OK ---- anyone knows to configure ubuntu for DUAL HEAD
